item.description:
Update on Parking: Due to other visitors parking in the Coffee Loft owners spaces, we can no longer park across the street. Please park in the small lot next to the Coffee Loft or on the side streets. I was also told that you can park on Lincoln Street as well. Sandra

 

 

During Wednesday nights 15 (and growing) members meet to share our craft, share the news of the day and have a good laugh. It's a home away from home for many of us and they are always happy to have us. We bring such cheer to the coffee shop.
item.how_to_find_us: If it's not obvious right away, ask the baristas when you enter where we are knitting
item.name: More Knitting, Crocheting and Needlework at the Coffee Loft
